content:
I want to enable/disable features for a particular crate for rust analyser. Some ways I know:
1) Set "rust-analyzer.cargo.features" in config
2) Set default features in Cargo.toml

The thing is that I don't want to change either of the above. First case changes config universally for every crate and in second case we have to change cargo.toml itself.
Is there a way to do this by some rust-analyzer config or some option while the file is open?

Also, is there any way to set "target" and "target-env" for rust-analyzer?

PS: If it matters, this is on vim and not vscode
